translation.zh: 知道了吗？麦吉尔这样拼…

translation.en: Well, run it again.
translation.zh: 再查一遍

translation.en: Well, no, no, no. It's paid up. Run it again--
translation.zh: 不，已经付了钱的再查一遍

translation.en: Oh, God, oh, God, oh, God.
translation.zh: 天呐

translation.en: Oh, my God, Cal. Cal. Look at me.
translation.zh: 卡尔，看着我

translation.en: Buddy, look at me. Are you okay? Say something.
translation.zh: 伙计，看着我，你没事吧？说句话吧

translation.en: What did you do? What did you do to my brother?
translation.zh: 你都干了些什么？你对我弟弟干了什么？

translation.en: -Why don't you look where you're going? -He came out of nowhere.
translation.zh: -你开车的时候怎么不看路？-他突然冒了出来

translation.en: You freaking hit him, man. You ran him over.
translation.zh: 你他妈把他撞飞了你从他身上碾了过去

translation.en: You ran over my brother.
translation.zh: 你把我弟弟碾了

translation.en: -I got the whole thing on video. -It was an accident.
translation.zh: -把整个过程都录下来了-这是场意外

translation.en: It was an accident. He didn't-- He didn't mean to. Look, let me just--
translation.zh: 是意外，他不是…他不是故意的，我先…

translation.en: -It's broke. Is it broke? -It's my leg.
translation.zh: -断了，断了吗？-我的腿

translation.en: -You broke his leg. -It's my leg.
translation.zh: -你把他的腿撞断了-是我的腿

translation.en: Why you driving around and not looking? Driving around breaking people's legs.
translation.zh: 为什么你开车不看路？到处乱逛撞断别人的腿

translation.en: -Okay. -Somebody call the cops.
translation.zh: -行了-快报警

translation.en: -Don't call-- Don't call the police. -Police.
translation.zh: -别，别叫警察-警察

translation.en: -Don't call the police. Don't call the police. -Call them myself.
translation.zh: -不要报警-我自己报警

translation.en: -Don't call the police. -Don't call the cops?
translation.zh: -不要报警-不要叫警察吗？

translation.en: -No. -How you gonna fix this?
translation.zh: -不要-那你打算怎么办？

translation.en: What are you gonna do to make things right?
translation.zh: 你准备怎么补偿我们？

translation.en: I don't know, fellas.
translation.zh: 我不知道，伙计

translation.en: What can I do to make it right?
translation.zh: 我该怎么补偿你们？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Five hundred dollars.
translation.zh: 五百块

translation.en: Five hundred bucks? Yeah?
translation.zh: 五百块 是吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: -What the hell, man? -Listen, Starlight Express.
translation.zh: -搞什么啊？兄弟-听着，星光快车

translation.en: I'm gonna give you a 9.6 for technique, 0.0 for choice of victim.
translation.zh: 我给你俩的演技打9点6分挑选目标的眼光打0分

translation.en: I'm a lawyer.
translation.zh: 我是个律师

translation.en: Furthermore, does this steaming pile of crap...
translation.zh: 再说了你们真的觉得开这种老爷车的人

translation.en: ...scream "payday" to you, huh?
translation.zh: 身上有油水可以搾吗？

translation.en: The only way that entire car is worth 500 bucks...
translation.zh: 里面要是坐个一晚三百的小姐

translation.en: ...is if there's a $300 hooker sitting in it.
translation.zh: 这辆车才能卖到五百元

translation.en: Now, let's talk about what you owe me for the windshield.
translation.zh: 我们来谈谈撞坏挡风玻璃得赔多少钱

translation.en: I'll take a check.
translation.zh: 用支票也行

translation.en: Chào cô, ladies.
translation.zh: 你好，女士们，你们好

translation.en: Chào cô, Mrs. Nguyen. My, don't you look...?
translation.zh: 你好，阮太太你真是迷人…

translation.en: My mail?
translation.zh: 有我的信吗？

translation.en: You work for people who have sex with chopped-off head?
translation.zh: 把死人头切下来操你还帮他们打官司？

translation.en: -Was it in the paper? -I heard it from my cousin.
translation.zh: -都登报纸了吗？-我听表兄说的

translation.en: Why? Why you work for these people?
translation.zh: 为什么啊？你为什么给这种人干活？

translation.en: Just lucky, I guess.
translation.zh: 我猜是我运气好吧

translation.en: Cucumber water for customer only.
translation.zh: 只有顾客才能享用黄瓜水

translation.en: You have zero messages.
translation.zh: 您没有语音留言

translation.en: Brenda, looking good.
translation.zh: 布兰达，这发型不错

translation.en: Nice 'do. Where's Lord Vader?
translation.zh: 好啊，维达大人去哪了？

translation.en: -He's not quite ready for you yet. -South conference room.
translation.zh: -他没准备好见您-南会议室

translation.en: -How about you wait out here? -How about I don't?
translation.zh: -不如您在这等-我还是别等了

translation.en: Oh, Sir Francis.
translation.zh: 法兰西斯先生

translation.en: -James. -Well groomed, as always.
translation.zh: -詹姆斯-您和往常一样精神

translation.en: -Okay. -All right.
translation.zh: -好吧-好的

translation.en: Keith, Karen. Yes.
translation.zh: 基斯，卡伦

translation.en: You have meddled with the primal forces of nature, Mr. Hamlin...
translation.zh: 你干预了自然的原始力量哈姆林先生

translation.en: ...and I won't have it.
translation.zh: 我不会坐视不理

translation.en: -Do you want me to call security? -It's okay, Brenda. We got it.
translation.zh: -需要我叫保安吗？-没关系，布兰达，交给我们吧

translation.en: -Hey, Jack. Hey, Nate. Hey, Aaron. -What can we do for you, Jimmy?
translation.zh: -你们好，杰克，内特，艾伦-有何贵干，吉米

translation.en: I'm sorry, it's this table.
translation.zh: 对不起，都怪这张桌子

translation.en: Something just comes over me.
translation.zh: 我有点情不自禁

translation.en: You can tell me what this 26,000 is supposed to be for.
translation.zh: 你可以告诉我这两万六是用来干什么的

translation.en: That's money for Chuck. Isn't that what you wanted?
translation.zh: 那是给查克的钱这不是你想要的结果吗？

translation.en: A measly 26 grand? Jesus, you're like Peter Minuit with the Indians.
translation.zh: 区区两万六，这就像彼得·米努伊特对印第安人所做的事

translation.en: Throw in some beads and shells while you're at it.
translation.zh: 心情好就扔一些珠子和贝壳给他们

translation.en: It's just a start, there'll be more. Unless you're gonna just tear them all up.
translation.zh: 这只是个开始，还会有更多除非你打算撕碎所有支票

translation.en: And why was it made out to me? Why not Chuck?
translation.zh: 为什么是我收到？为什么不是查克？

translation.en: Can he make his way to the bank?
translation.zh: 他能自己去银行吗？

translation.en: I just assumed it was best to have the money go through you.
translation.zh: 我只是认为让你转交这样最好

translation.en: We can do it any way you want.
translation.zh: 我们可以按照你的意愿来完成

translation.en: This isn't going away, Howard.
translation.zh: 这事不算完，豪沃德

translation.en: What Chuck did for this firm, and damn near single-handedly...
translation.zh: 查克为这间事务所做的一切他几乎是单枪匹马

translation.en: ...one-third of this place belongs to him. Yeah.
translation.zh: 这里的三分之一都应该属于他是的

translation.en: What have you got, 12 chairs here? Four of these chairs are Chuck's.
translation.zh: 比如这里有十二把椅子那其中有四把是查克的

translation.en: You got five of these light thingamajigs...
translation.zh: 这有五个这种发光装置

translation.en: ...one and two-thirds are Chuck's. Yeah.
translation.zh: 那一又三分之二个是查克的

translation.en: How many Danishes? Six Danishes?
translation.zh: 你们面前有几个丹麦面包？六个吗？

translation.en: -You can have all the Danish you want. -No, no. They're Chuck's Danishes.
translation.zh: -所有面包都可以给你-不他们都属于查克

translation.en: And Chuck isn't greedy, so he'll just take two...
translation.zh: 而查克不是贪心的人所以他只要两个…

translation.en: ...plus $17 million. In that ballpark.
translation.zh: 再加上大约一千七百万美元

translation.en: I mean, we'll know once we get the accountants poking around here.
translation.zh: 我们会知道的只要我们让会计人员到这里转一圈

translation.en: Until then, no more penny ante checks designed to make it look...
translation.zh: 在那之前不用开什么小额支票

translation.en: ...like Chuck still works here. He doesn't. He never will again.
translation.zh: 好像查克还在这里工作似的他不在这里了，再也不会回来了

translation.en: It's time to do right by him, and cash him out.
translation.zh: 是时候还他公平并付钱给他了

translation.en: So these are Chuck's own wishes that you're conveying?
translation.zh: 你转达的这些都是查克本人的意愿吗？

translation.en: This is what's best for him.
translation.zh: 这是他最好的选择

translation.en: So he personally told you that it's his wish to withdraw from the firm?
translation.zh: 是他亲口告诉你他想退出事务所吗？

translation.en: See, that would surprise me.
translation.zh: 看来不是不然我真得吓一跳

translation.en: It's been nearly a year since he set foot in here.
translation.zh: 他不来这里已经快一年了

translation.en: -I'm just doing what's in his best interests. -So am I.
translation.zh: -我只是为他争取最大利益-我也是

translation.en: And I, for one, believe he's gonna lick this thing.
translation.zh: 而我相信他将会很乐意看到这些

translation.en: Until then, his office is just as he left it. His secretary is still on payroll.
translation.zh: 在他回归之前，他的办公室会保持原样他的秘书也依然有薪水

translation.en: If Chuck can call this an extended sabbatical, then so can we.
translation.zh: 如果查克把这叫作延长休假那我们也可以

translation.en: He's that important to us.
translation.zh: 他对我们就是这么重要

translation.en: You know what? Let's let a jury figure it out.
translation.zh: 这样吧，还是让陪审团来裁定

translation.en: Yeah. They're gonna love you, Howard.
translation.zh: 是啊，他们会很爱你的豪沃德

translation.en: You're so down to earth and relatable.
translation.zh: 你是那么务实可靠

translation.en: And you will atone.
translation.zh: 而你必将赎罪

translation.en: It's Ned Beatty from Network.
translation.zh: 是《电视台风云》里尼德·巴蒂说的话

translation.en: For chrissakes, guys.
translation.zh: 天呐，你们怎么什么都不知道？

translation.en: Jimmy.
translation.zh: 吉米

translation.en: I almost forgot. This month's filings.
translation.zh: 我差点忘了这个月的法院立案

translation.en: You can save me the postage.
translation.zh: 可以帮我省下邮寄费了

translation.en: Weren't you listening in there? Chuck doesn't work here anymore.
translation.zh: 刚才你听到我说的话了吗？查克已经不在这里工作了

translation.en: Think I'm gonna help you establish a paper trail?
translation.zh: 你认为我会帮你建立书面记录吗？

translation.en: -Jimmy-- -Stop trying to pawn that shit off on him.
translation.zh: -吉米-不，别想把屎盆子往他身上扣

translation.en: Jimmy.
translation.zh: 吉米

translation.en: You know, Jimmy, sometimes in our line of work...
translation.zh: 吉米，有时候在我们这行里

translation.en: ...you can get so caught up in the idea of winning...
translation.zh: 容易被取胜的欲望冲昏头脑

translation.en: ...that you forget to listen to your heart.
translation.zh: 却忘记倾听自己内心的声音

translation.en: Give Chuck my love, would you?
translation.zh: 替我向查克问好好吗？

translation.en: Oh, there you are. Betsy, Craig.
translation.zh: 原来你在这里啊贝茜，克雷格

translation.en: Hi. Oh, Craig, you need your own purse.
translation.zh: 你好，克雷格你需要个自己钱包

translation.en: -Did it work out? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -事情顺利吗？-是的

translation.en: It was very nice.
translation.zh: 很不错

translation.en: -You look lovely today. -Oh, thank you so much.
translation.zh: -你今天真漂亮-谢谢你

translation.en: -Couldn't you just--? -You know I can't.
translation.zh: -你能不能…-你明知我做不到

translation.en: Son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 狗娘养的

translation.en: -You ground yourself? -Yes, I grounded myself.
translation.zh: -东西放外面了吗？-是的，放外面了

translation.en: You gotta stop putting bacon on the list.
translation.zh: 你不能再买培根肉了

translation.en: That cooler's looking like a trichinosis stew.
translation.zh: 因为冰箱看起来就像一锅炖旋毛虫

translation.en: Perfect timing.
translation.zh: 来得正好

translation.en: Professor Brans Vogelson?
translation.zh: 布兰斯·弗格森教授

translation.en: University of Helsinki?
translation.zh: 赫尔辛基大学

translation.en: Yeah, you're gonna have to get that translated.
translation.zh: 是的，你必须把这些翻译过来

translation.en: -Into Swedish? -Finnish.
translation.zh: -翻译成瑞典语吗？-芬兰语

translation.en: Finish translating into--?
translation.zh: 芬兰语，翻译成…

translation.en: I'm sure there's someone at UNM who can do that.
translation.zh: 我相信新墨西哥大学会有人可以做到

translation.en: You do know I'm trying to start a legal practice?
translation.zh: 你知道我打算开一间律师事务所，不是吗？

translation.en: Vogelson's been working on the effects of electromagnetic fields on zebrafish and--
translation.zh: 弗格森正在研究电磁场对斑马鱼的影响，还有…

translation.en: Financial Times.
translation.zh: 《金融时报》

translation.en: Yeah, I knew you missed it, so I figured, what the heck?
translation.zh: 是啊，我知道你想看所以我想“管他呢”

translation.en: Thank you. I know it's expensive here.
translation.zh: 谢谢你，我知道这很贵

translation.en: -That's not-- -I don't expect you to go out-of-pocket.
translation.zh: -不是…-我可不希望你自掏腰包

translation.en: Go ahead, reimburse yourself.
translation.zh: 拿去你的酬劳

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Hey, Chuck, can you not read that for a second?
translation.zh: 查克，你能不能先别看那个？

translation.en: Can we talk?
translation.zh: 我们能谈谈吗？

translation.en: Are you all right? You look peaked.
translation.zh: 你还好吗？你看起来很憔悴

translation.en: I'm fine. Please, just sit.
translation.zh: 我没事，请坐

translation.en: You're not in trouble?
translation.zh: 你没遇到麻烦

translation.en: You gotta cash out.
translation.zh: 你得从事务所撤股了

translation.en: -You gotta. -Again? Really?
translation.zh: -必须-又来了，不是吧

translation.en: There's no other way.
translation.zh: 没有别的选择了

translation.en: I know that you don't wanna hear it, but you've got to.
translation.zh: 我知道你不想听这些可你必须这样做

translation.en: You know I'm going to beat this.
translation.zh: 你知道我能熬过这一关

translation.en: You know I'm going to get better.
translation.zh: 你知道我会好起来的

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Well, then there's nothing more to talk about.
translation.zh: 那么，就没什么好说的了

translation.en: I will beat this. Ergo, a falsis principiis proficisci.
translation.zh: 我会渡过这一劫由此，从错误的原理推导

translation.en: -Meaning.... -That's not--
translation.zh: -意思是-那不是…

translation.en: -Meaning.... -That's the one about false principles--
translation.zh: -意思是-那是说原理错误

translation.en: You proceed from false principles.
translation.zh: 你从错误的原理得出结论

translation.en: Your argument is built on quicksand, therefore it collapses.
translation.zh: 你的辩论毫无根基因此也就不攻自破了

translation.en: Yeah, you're not listening.
translation.zh: 对，你没在听我说话

translation.en: Fine. Let's take this to its logical conclusion.
translation.zh: 让我们得出合乎逻辑的结论

translation.en: In order to pay out my share...
translation.zh: 为了支付我的股份

translation.en: ...suppose my partners are forced to liquidate the firm.
translation.zh: 假设我的合伙人会被迫清算事务所

translation.en: -Then what? -That's their problem.
translation.zh: -然后呢？-那是他们的问题

translation.en: My clients are out in the cold.
translation.zh: 我的委托人会被扫地出门

translation.en: My cases are scattered to the winds, 126 people lose their jobs.
translation.zh: 我的案子都要完蛋126个人会失业

translation.en: What happens to your cronies in the mailroom?
translation.zh: 你那些收发室的好朋友该怎么办？

translation.en: The assistants, paralegals, the janitorial staff...
translation.zh: 还有那些律师，律师助理保洁工人

translation.en: ...all of them out on the street.
translation.zh: 全都会流落街头

translation.en: Your friend Kim, a promising career, over and done with.
translation.zh: 你的好朋友金大好前程化为泡影

translation.en: Hamlin owes you everything. You built that place singlehandedly...
translation.zh: 一切都是哈姆林欠你的你一手打造了这家事务所

translation.en: ...while he was at Four Hills working on his bunker shot.
translation.zh: 他那时还在四山俱乐部练习沙坑球呢

translation.en: -Let's not exaggerate. I helped. -You helped.
translation.zh: -不要那么夸张，我是帮了忙而已-帮忙而已

translation.en: All the more reason not to tear it down just for a little bit of cash.
translation.zh: 所以就更没必要为了点小钱把这一切都毁了

translation.en: Chuck, I'm going under. Okay?
translation.zh: 查克，我快完了，好吗？

translation.en: For the third time, with these bull-crap contract counsel--
translation.zh: 第三次接手这些狗屁合约官司…

translation.en: -Bull crap? -Bull crap, pissant, PD cases...
translation.zh: -怎么是“狗屁”-这些七百块一件的

translation.en: ...at 700 bucks a shot.
translation.zh: 狗屁小公设律师活

translation.en: Public defender work is some of the best experience there is.
translation.zh: 公设辩护律师可是律师最难得的经历之一

translation.en: I just had a case, Chuck, with three clients.
translation.zh: 我刚刚经手一个案子查克，三个委托人

translation.en: Arraignment, voir dire, jury trial, the whole nine yards.
translation.zh: 提讯，预审，庭审全套下来

translation.en: You know what I took home? Seven hundred bucks.
translation.zh: 你知道我进账多少吗？七百块

translation.en: I might as well head down to skid row and sell plasma.
translation.zh: 还不如去贫民窟卖血赚得多

translation.en: You're representing people who have nowhere else to turn.
translation.zh: 你代表的都是些走投无路的人

translation.en: Money is beside the point.
translation.zh: 钱不是重点

translation.en: Money is not beside the point. Money is the point.
translation.zh: 钱恰恰就是重点

translation.en: I keep telling you, have patience. There are no shortcuts.
translation.zh: 我一直告诉你，要有耐心没有捷径可走

translation.en: -Do good work and the clients-- -The clients will come. Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: -把工作干好，自然会有委托人找上门-自然会有委托人找上门，对，我明白

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Hand to God, I wasn't gonna say this, but you are broke.
translation.zh: 对天发誓，我本不打算这样说可你破产了

translation.en: I can't carry both of us. I've been trying like hell, but I can't.
translation.zh: 我负担不了我们两个人我已经使出了浑身解数，可我做不到

translation.en: You're saying, what, you think you have to provide for me?
translation.zh: 你这是在说什么你以为我需要你来养吗？

translation.en: -I never asked you that. -You didn't have to ask, okay?
translation.zh: -我从没让你这样做-你根本不用开口，好吗？

translation.en: I've been doing my damnedest, but the day of reckoning is here.
translation.zh: 我已经尽我最大努力了但我也快熬到头了

translation.en: Soon, Chuck, you're gonna be out on the street...
translation.zh: 很快，查克你就要流落街头了

translation.en: ...with all the electromagnetism in the world raining down on you.
translation.zh: 到时候全世界的电磁场都会碾过你

translation.en: Now, please, please, picture that...
translation.zh: 拜托，好好想象一下那场景

translation.en: ...then tell me that money is beside the point.
translation.zh: 然后再告诉我钱不是重点

translation.en: -This is what has you all worked up? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -让你烦恼的就是这事吗？-是的

translation.en: Jimmy, there's nothing to worry about.
translation.zh: 吉米，没什么好担心的

translation.en: -Here. -What is this?
translation.zh: -给-这是什么？

translation.en: A stipend. There's gonna be one every week.
translation.zh: 一笔津贴以后每周都会有

translation.en: Eight hundred and fifty seven dollars from Hamlin Hamlin McGill.
translation.zh: 哈姆林·哈姆林·麦吉尔联合律师事务所给的857美元

translation.en: I'm gonna pay him back. Every penny.
translation.zh: 我会一分不差地还给他们

translation.en: I didn't wanna take anything, but Howard was very insistent.
translation.zh: 我本不想要的但豪沃德坚持要给我

translation.en: And I'm gonna pay you back too.
translation.zh: 我也会全还给你的

translation.en: -Hamlin was here? -It's not like I'm a recluse.
translation.zh: -等等，哈姆林来过了吗？-我又不是闭门谢客的隐士

translation.en: -He put his cell phone in the mailbox? -He understands the situation.
translation.zh: -怎么，他把手机留在信箱里了吗？-他理解我的情况

translation.en: -He grounded himself? -Of course.
translation.zh: -他把东西都留在外面吗？-当然

translation.en: And the two of you agreed that since, as everybody knows...
translation.zh: 然后你们两个达成一致既然众所周知

translation.en: ...you're going back to work any day now, the firm should help you make ends meet?
translation.zh: 你随时都可能回去工作事务所理应帮你贴补家用

translation.en: That's correct, minus the sarcasm.
translation.zh: 除去你话里的讽刺味正是这样

translation.en: Hamlin's making you a chump.
translation.zh: 哈姆林这是把你当傻子玩

translation.en: I'm going to get better.
translation.zh: 我会好起来的

translation.en: I'm gonna go back to work, and I'm picking up where I left off.
translation.zh: 我会回去工作从哪里跌倒就从哪里爬起来

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Sorry, Chuck.
translation.zh: 查克，对不起

translation.en: I understand that you're trying to look out for me...
translation.zh: 我知道，你一直都想帮我

translation.en: ...but you're missing the bigger picture.
translation.zh: 但你现在因小失大了

translation.en: I got it.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Speaking of which....
translation.zh: 还有件事

translation.en: Howard brought this.
translation.zh: 豪沃德拿来了这个

translation.en: -He's concerned. -What?
translation.zh: -他有点担忧-什么？

translation.en: You have to admit, it could be confusing. Hamlin Hamlin McGill. James M. McGill.
translation.zh: 你得承认这容易让人混淆他的公司名是哈姆林·哈姆林·麦吉尔 而你的叫詹姆斯·M·麦吉尔

translation.en: -That's my name, I was born with it. I-- -Still.
translation.zh: -我就叫这名字-还是很容易混淆

translation.en: How about "Vanguard Law"?
translation.zh: 要不改叫先锋律师事务所吧？

translation.en: Or "Gibraltar." Ple--
translation.zh: 那直布罗陀法律公司怎么样？

translation.en: Wait, so I'm not supposed to use my name on Hamlin's say-so?
translation.zh: 等等，所以因为哈姆林我还不能用自己的名字了？

translation.en: What's he gonna do, sue me?
translation.zh: 他打算怎么样？要起诉我吗？

translation.en: Nobody wants to create an adversarial situation.
translation.zh: 谁也不想给自己找麻烦

translation.en: I'm sure Howard would gladly pay the cost of new matchbooks and so on.
translation.zh: 豪沃德肯定愿意付钱给你做个新火柴盒广告

translation.en: It's simply a matter of professional courtesy.
translation.zh: 这只是职业礼节罢了

translation.en: Chuck, whose side are you on?
translation.zh: 查克，你到底是哪边的？

translation.en: There are no sides.
translation.zh: 什么哪边不哪边

translation.en: But Jimmy....
translation.zh: 不过，吉米

translation.en: Wouldn't you rather build your own identity?
translation.zh: 你难道不想打出自己的牌子吗？

translation.en: Why ride on someone else's coattails?
translation.zh: 别总想沾别人的光

translation.en: You wanna dance, Howard?
translation.zh: 豪沃德，你想跳舞吗？

translation.en: Let's dance.
translation.zh: 那我们就跳吧

translation.en: Yeah, backside on it.
translation.zh: 躺好

translation.en: Go.
translation.zh: 滑

translation.en: You can get closer than that, you bitch. Come on.
translation.zh: 你能不能滑得再靠近我一点，废物，快点

translation.en: All right, here it comes.
translation.zh: 好的，来了

translation.en: There you go. Better.
translation.zh: 这就对了，好多了

translation.en: -How was that? -It's all right. Here, take a look.
translation.zh: -我滑得怎么样？-还行，都录了 你看

translation.en: -So tighter. Everything-- -Tighter? What--? Tighter what?
translation.zh: -还是那句话，身体要绷紧-绷紧什么呀？什么绷紧

translation.en: I don't know, just stand tighter. You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 我也说不清就是站着的时候要绷，明白吗？

translation.en: I don't know what you mean.
translation.zh: 我不明白

translation.en: That's a-- We can call that a stylistic choice, I guess.
translation.zh: 就是选择一种风格

translation.en: Hey, fellas. We got business.
translation.zh: 伙计们，生意来了

translation.en: How did you find us?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我们在这里？

translation.en: I know. Eerie, right?
translation.zh: 挺奇怪的，是吧？

translation.en: Whoa, come on. Give me 30 seconds.
translation.zh: 等等，就耽误你们三十秒

translation.en: Could be the most profitable 30 seconds of your lives.
translation.zh: 这说不定是你们人生中最有价值的三十秒

translation.en: Let me tell you about a young guy.
translation.zh: 我给你们讲个故事吧有个小伙子

translation.en: Actually, he's about your age.
translation.zh: 他其实和你们差不多大

translation.en: He lived a long way from here...
translation.zh: 住在离这里很远的地方

translation.en: ...in a town called Cicero, Illinois.
translation.zh: 在伊利诺伊州的西塞罗市

translation.en: And in Cicero, he was the man.
translation.zh: 在那里，他可是个人物

translation.en: I mean, when he strolled down the street...
translation.zh: 这么说吧，他走在街上

translation.en: ...all the corner boys would give him the high five.
translation.zh: 所有小混混都会和他击掌打招呼

translation.en: All the finest babes would smile at him...
translation.zh: 所有漂亮妞儿都会冲他笑

translation.en: ...and hope that he would smile back.
translation.zh: 巴望着他能回个笑容

translation.en: They called him Slippin' Jimmy...
translation.zh: 大家都叫他“风流吉米”

translation.en: ...and everybody wanted to be his friend.
translation.zh: 所有人都想和他做朋友

translation.en: Slippin' Jimmy.
translation.zh: “风流吉米”

translation.en: What the hell kind of name is that?
translation.zh: 这是什么狗屁绰号？

translation.en: Well, I'll tell you now. Winters in Cicero are murder.
translation.zh: 听我说西塞罗的冬天冷得能冻死人

translation.en: You guys, growing up out here in the Golden West, you don't know.
translation.zh: 你们在金色的西部长大的根本想象不到那有多冷

translation.en: Okay? I'm talking cold that'll freeze the snot right in your nose.
translation.zh: 那里的冬天能把你的鼻涕冻住

translation.en: I'm talking wind that'll cut through your jacket and carve you up like a Ginsu knife.
translation.zh: 那寒风能割裂你的夹克衫然后像一把金厨刀一样把你切碎

translation.en: In fact, most folks in Cicero were scared of winter.
translation.zh: 总之，西塞罗的大部分居民都很害怕冬天

translation.en: But not Jimmy.
translation.zh: 但吉米可不怕

translation.en: Jimmy would wait around all summer...
translation.zh: 夏天的时候，他就等啊等

translation.en: ...and when September finally rolled around...
translation.zh: 九月终于来了

translation.en: ...and he'd feel that first cold wind come sweeping off Lake Michigan...
translation.zh: 他感受到了第一股凉风从密歇根湖吹来

translation.en: ...he knew it was coming.
translation.zh: 他知道，它要来了

translation.en: Was it Christmas? Was it Kwanzaa?
translation.zh: 他等的是圣诞节吗 ？是宽扎节吗？

translation.en: Better. It was slip-and-fall season.
translation.zh: 都不是是一年一度的碰瓷季

translation.en: As soon as it was cold enough, he'd find a nice, smooth patch of ice.
translation.zh: 很快，等到外面变得非常冷他就找一块光滑结冰的地面

translation.en: State Street was good, Michigan Avenue was better.
translation.zh: 州级公路也行密歇根大道更好

translation.en: He'd pick his spot, wait for it to get busy...
translation.zh: 他选好点等到路上人多的时候

translation.en: ...then he'd walk out on the ice and boom.
translation.zh: 他就踩着那冰片滑过去然后，轰的一声

translation.en: He would biff it so hard...
translation.zh: 他摔得那么狠

translation.en: ...people would come running from five blocks away.
translation.zh: 五个街区外的人都跑来看

translation.en: Yeah, but did he collect?
translation.zh: 那他碰瓷碰成了吗？

translation.en: "Did he collect?" Slippin' Jimmy had it dialed in.
translation.zh: “成了吗”“风流吉米”从来没失手过

translation.en: One good fall, he'd clear 6, 8 grand.
translation.zh: 摔一次，他就能要来六千或者八千块

translation.en: That'd keep him in Old Milwaukee and Maui Waui right through Labor Day.
translation.zh: 那些钱够他每天喝老密尔沃基酒吸大麻，一直用到劳动节

translation.en: -Eight grand? -Eight grand.
translation.zh: -八千块啊-没错

translation.en: Now, see, I look at you guys, I see potential.
translation.zh: 我觉得你们都是潜力股

translation.en: The skateboard's a nice wrinkle, that makes it a year-round gig.
translation.zh: 你们用滑板碰瓷很妙全年都可以干

translation.en: Clearly, you know how to take a header. Right?
translation.zh: 很明显，你非常清楚怎么去摔对吗？

translation.en: But I gotta ask you...
translation.zh: 但我得问你

translation.en: ...your best day ever, how much did you clear?
translation.zh: 收成最好的一天赚了多少钱？

translation.en: -Six hundred and thirty. -Six hundred and thirty.
translation.zh: -六百三-六百三

translation.en: Six hundred and thirty bucks? Was that for one fall?
translation.zh: 六百三十块吗是摔一次的钱数吗？

translation.en: -Two. -Two falls in one day?
translation.zh: -两次-一天摔两次？

translation.en: -Even at your age, that's gotta hurt. -True that.
translation.zh: -即使是你们这年纪，也会很疼吧-确实疼

translation.en: All right. Well, I got a job for you.
translation.zh: 好吧，我给你们一个活儿

translation.en: How's 2 grand sound?
translation.zh: 两千块怎么样？

translation.en: Two grand for one hit?
translation.zh: 摔一次给两千块吗？

translation.en: One hit.
translation.zh: 就一次

translation.en: Plus you get to learn from the best.
translation.zh: 而且，你还能跟最好的人学习

translation.en: -Nice boat. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -船不错-是啊

translation.en: Discrete, like a stripper pole in a mosque.
translation.zh: 藏得很隐蔽就跟清真寺里的钢管舞杆一样

translation.en: Forget the boat. Look at the car. You know what that is?
translation.zh: 别管那船了，看那辆车知道是什么车吗？

translation.en: -I don't know, a station wagon? -It's a Mercury.
translation.zh: -不知道，旅行车吗？-那是辆水星

translation.en: A 1988 Mercury Sable wagon.
translation.zh: 1988年的水星黑貂休旅车

translation.en: Remember it. Burn it into your brains, you got it?
translation.zh: 记住它，印在脑子里记住了吗？

translation.en: It's a Mercury Sable wagon, sure.
translation.zh: 没问题，水星黑貂休旅车

translation.en: Close your eyes. What color is it?
translation.zh: 闭上眼车是什么颜色？

translation.en: -Brown. -Brown.
translation.zh: -棕色-棕色

translation.en: No, it's medium sandalwood.
translation.zh: 不，是中檀色闭着眼睛

translation.en: Keep your eyes closed. How does the license plate start?
translation.zh: 车牌号开始是几？

translation.en: -Four. -Give those gentlemen a gold star.
translation.zh: -四-给你们一个金星奖章

translation.en: Betsy Kettleman's her name.
translation.zh: 她的名字是贝茜·凯托曼

translation.en: Every weekday between 2:25 and 2:50 she comes through here...
translation.zh: 每个工作日2点25和2点50之间

translation.en: ...on her way to pick up her kids at Kit Carson Elementary.
translation.zh: 她都会经过这里去基特卡森小学接孩子

translation.en: You need a place where she's gonna slow down, right?
translation.zh: 现在你需要找到一个她会减速的地方，对吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -All right. Well, there you go.
translation.zh: -对-好了，在那儿

translation.en: She slows down, she hangs a right...
translation.zh: 她减速了她稍往右靠

translation.en: ...you come shooting out of there and do what you did to me.
translation.zh: 你从那边冲出来把你对我那一套拿出来

translation.en: You go ass over teakettle, you make it a blue-ribbon special.
translation.zh: 摔个七荤八素摔出一流水平

translation.en: When she gets out of the car, you're suffering Saint Sebastian, right?
translation.zh: 她从车上下来以后你正疼得昏天暗地，对吗？

translation.en: You're the hammer. You get in her face, you scare the bejeezus out of her.
translation.zh: 你是重头戏，直接走到她面前把她吓到灵魂出窍

translation.en: Give me your phone.
translation.zh: 把手机给我

translation.en: -It's kind of busy here, don't you think? -Yeah. Witnesses are good.
translation.zh: -这里人很多，你不觉得吗？-有目击者是好事

translation.en: Witnesses are pressure, all right?
translation.zh: 目击者能制造压力知道吗？

translation.en: Now, once you've got her good and rattled...
translation.zh: 一把她完全吓住

translation.en: ...then you call for an ambulance, but really you're calling for me.
translation.zh: 然后你就打电话叫救护车但实际上，你是在给我打电话

translation.en: I'm number one on your speed dial, next to your weed dealer.
translation.zh: 我在你快速拨号的第一个就在你的大麻贩子的旁边

translation.en: You call me, I hotfoot it over here. I just "happened" to be driving by.
translation.zh: 你打给我，我会火速赶来我只是“恰好”开车路过

translation.en: I stop to see what the trouble is, and this is the important part...
translation.zh: 我停下看有什么麻烦最重要的一点是

translation.en: ...you don't know me. We've never met. You got it?
translation.zh: 你们不认识我我们从没见过，知道吗？

translation.en: -Sure. -Okay.
translation.zh: -当然-好的

translation.en: Now, I'm Mrs. K's white knight. We go mano a mano.
translation.zh: 现在，我会是凯托曼太太的救星我们一对一交谈

translation.en: You light into me, okay? Get nasty.
translation.zh: 然后你过来教训我，狠一点

translation.en: No touching, leave the hair alone...
translation.zh: 但不要动手，别弄乱发型

translation.en: ...but otherwise, you know, open season.
translation.zh: 除此之外，自由发挥

translation.en: Yell, stomp, call me a douche bag.
translation.zh: 大喊，跺脚骂我是个混蛋

translation.en: I'm gonna play it cool, give you back some of the razzmatazz...
translation.zh: 我会装作没事让你一个人在那儿闹

translation.en: ...and once she's seen the fireworks, you fold like a lawn chair. Happy ending.
translation.zh: 一旦她看过了这一出你就像折叠椅一样收住，皆大欢喜

translation.en: -When do we get our money? -After.
translation.zh: -我们什么时候拿到钱-事后

translation.en: -"After." -After.
translation.zh: -事后？-事后

translation.en: You get paid when I get paid. I'm the rising tide that raises all dinghies.
translation.zh: 我拿到钱你们就拿到钱我才是推动整个事件发展的人

translation.en: Now, pop quiz. What's the car?
translation.zh: 好了，快速测验，什么车？

translation.en: -Mercury Sable wagon. -Baby-poop brown.
translation.zh: -水星黑貂休旅车-婴儿屎棕色

translation.en: -Okay, do you know me? -No.
translation.zh: -好，你们认识我吗？-不认识

translation.en: Damn straight. Go with God.
translation.zh: 太对了上帝与你们同在

translation.en: Well, I'm just glad I happened to be passing by.
translation.zh: 我很高兴我恰好路过

translation.en: Happy to be of help, Betsy. May I call you Betsy?
translation.zh: 很高兴帮助你，贝茜我能叫你贝茜吗？

translation.en: Please, call me James.
translation.zh: 叫我詹姆斯就行了

translation.en: Oh, the kid will be fine. Don't worry.
translation.zh: 那孩子没事儿，别担心

translation.en: He just got his bell rung a little. I'll handle that.
translation.zh: 他只是有点儿眼冒金星我来处理就行了

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: Oh, no, no. I wouldn't think of taking your money for this, so....
translation.zh: 我没想过因为这事收你的钱

translation.en: The embezzlement case? Yes, I'd be happy to talk it over.
translation.zh: 挪用公款的案子吗？是的，我很乐意谈谈

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Two-minute warning. Two-minute warning.
translation.zh: 警告，两分钟后到

translation.en: Got it.
translation.zh: 收到

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天呐

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 出什么事了？

translation.en: Call 911.
translation.zh: 快报警

translation.en: Oh, my God. Cal. Cal.
translation.zh: 天呐，卡尔

translation.en: Look at me. Are you okay? Buddy, say something.
translation.zh: 看着我，你还好吗？兄弟，说句话啊

translation.en: Cal, look at me. Come on already.
translation.zh: 卡尔，看着我，快点

translation.en: What is she doing in there? She making a sandwich?
translation.zh: 她在那里做什么呢她是在做三明治吗？

translation.en: Where's her sense of responsibility?
translation.zh: 她的责任心呢？

translation.en: -What? -What?
translation.zh: -什么？-什么？

translation.en: Hey. What the...?
translation.zh: 搞什么…

translation.en: Funny to run into you, Betsy. I was just strolling the neighborhood.
translation.zh: 这么巧遇到你，贝茜我只是在四处转转

translation.en: You were in an accident? Oh, that's....
translation.zh: 你碰上了事故真是…

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: -Yeah. -She took off on us.
translation.zh: -喂-她撇下我们跑了

translation.en: -She what? -It was textbook, man.
translation.zh: -她什么？-一切按部就班，伙计

translation.en: We were diamonds. But then she just took off.
translation.zh: 我们成功碰瓷了但是她却跑了

translation.en: Okay, wait. She hit and run?
translation.zh: 等等她肇事逃逸？

translation.en: That's what I'm saying. She bailed and wailed.
translation.zh: 是的，她猛踩油门逃之夭夭了

translation.en: Okay, just stay where you are. I'll come get you.
translation.zh: 好，你们待在原地等我

translation.en: No, no, no. Screw that, man. We're following her.
translation.zh: 不，去你的我们跟着她呢

translation.en: You're-- How are--? You're following her how?
translation.zh: 你们…怎么…你们是怎么跟着她的？

translation.en: We got our ways, yo.
translation.zh: 山人自有妙计

translation.en: Okay, okay, okay. New plan. New plan.
translation.zh: 好，计划有变

translation.en: You do know me. I'm your lawyer. You got that? I'll meet you at the school.
translation.zh: 你们认识我，我是你们的律师明白吗？我们在学校碰头

translation.en: No, she's way past the school.
translation.zh: 不，她开过学校了

translation.en: She hooked a left on Juan Tabo, now she's coming into Holiday Park.
translation.zh: 她刚刚在胡安塔布街左转了正要去假日公园

translation.en: Okay, stay with her. When she gets where she's going...
translation.zh: 好，跟着她等她到了目的地

translation.en: ...wherever that is, don't do anything.
translation.zh: 不管是哪里，什么都别做

translation.en: -Wait for me. -Wait for what?
translation.zh: -等我来-等什么等？

translation.en: You haven't been right even once. Slippin' Jimmy my ass.
translation.zh: 你哪次说对过风流你个头吉米

translation.en: You fell into the honeypot, kid. You get it? Hit-and-run is a felony.
translation.zh: 你们撞大运了，孩子你明白吗？肇事逃逸可是重罪

translation.en: -So what? -"So what?" So more money.
translation.zh: -所以呢？-“所以呢”，所以就有更多的钱

translation.en: He says we fell in the honeypot.
translation.zh: 他说我们撞大运了

translation.en: -He says more money. -So, what do we need him for?
translation.zh: -还说“更多的钱”-所以我们还要他干什么呢？

translation.en: Cal, Lars, whoever--
translation.zh: 卡尔，拉斯你们谁…

translation.en: Oh, damn it.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Come on, come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: -Do it, do it, do it. -Son of a bitch.
translation.zh: -来啊-狗娘养的

translation.en: Come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: -Hey, your leg. -Oh, I'm gonna do this one.
translation.zh: -你的腿-这回交给我吧

translation.en: Okay. Hey. Hey. Yo, hold up.
translation.zh: 好，喂，等等

translation.en: Hey, yeah, you. What is the matter with you?
translation.zh: 没错，就是你，你怎么回事？

translation.en: -You hit and run. -You ran him over.
translation.zh: -你肇事逃逸了-你撞伤了他
